title: Love Hurts
description:
Emerson Dameron and Jill Karliner share stories about coping with loved ones who were struggling with addictions.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Jill Karliner, Emerson Dameron, RISK! Theme Team, The Everly Brothers, Corey Kilgannon, Taj Easton, Sam Karliner)
